name: Minotough
description:
This game is my submission for the 33rd Ludum Dare

This is my first game jam and I hope it does well :)

This isn't the final version, I'm just uploading it for posterity sake.

Minotough 0.04
-Cleaned up UI slightly

Minotough 0.03
-Added Feirce Minotaurs

Minotough 0.02:
-Added AI. Vs Computer can be played now

-Gave Source code
